com.hp.opencall.jmsc.test.mandatory.functional.join
Class InitJoinTest.JoinManager

java.lang.Object
  com.hp.opencall.jmsc.test.mandatory.functional.join.InitJoinTest.JoinManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.media.mscontrol.join.JoinEventListener
Enclosing class:
InitJoinTest
public class InitJoinTest.JoinManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.media.mscontrol.join.JoinEventListener

Everything needed to manage an asynchronous join/unjoin between two JoinableContainers.

Use InitJoinTest.Context and InitJoinTest.TestState, with a simplified state machine: only JOINED and UNJOINED.

See Also:

public void onEvent(javax.media.mscontrol.join.JoinEvent event)
